Sharm Best Holiday.address: Sharm El Sheikh, 46619 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Sharm Best Holiday.description:
Situated in Sharm El Sheikh, Sharm Best Holiday offers a balcony with mountain and pool views, as well as a year-round outdoor pool, spa facilities and wellness packages. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a casino and an outdoor fireplace. The property features a children's playground, parking on-site and an electric vehicle charging station.

Boasting a Nintendo Wii, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a toaster, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 1 bedroom, and 1 bathroom with a hot tub and a bidet. The unit is air conditioned and is comprised of a terrace with an outdoor dining area as well as a flat-screen TV with streaming services. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

There is a coffee shop, and packed lunches are also available.

Yoga classes and fitness classes are arranged at the fitness room in house. For guests with children, the apartment provides kids pool and an indoor play area. Skiing and cycling can be enjoyed nearby, while a ski equipment rental service, a private beach area and ski-to-door access are also available on-site.

Popular points of interest near Sharm Best Holiday include Naama Bay Beach, Tonino Lamborghini International Convention Center Sharm El Sheikh and The Heavenly Cathedral. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Regency Lodge Hotel.description:
Set in Sharm El Sheikh, 1.9 km from Reef Beach, Regency Lodge Hotel offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as an indoor pool. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi.

At the hotel all rooms have air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with pool view. Each room is equipped with a safety deposit box and some rooms also offer lake views.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options.

Regency Lodge Hotel offers a children's playground.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sharm El Maya Bay Beach, Ras um Sid and Al Fanar Light House. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport, 17 km from Regency Lodge Hotel.

Serenity Lodge.address: 149 Roma Street Villa District 2, 46628 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Serenity Lodge.description:
Set in Sharm El Sheikh, 300 metres from White Knight Bay Beach, Serenity Lodge offers accommodation with a private beach area, free private parking, pool with a view and a bar. The property has sea views and is 600 metres from Ras Nasrani Beach and 1.9 km from SOHO Square Sharm El Sheikh. The bed and breakfast features family rooms.

At the bed and breakfast, every unit has a desk. With a private bathroom equipped with a bath, units at the bed and breakfast also have free WiFi, while some rooms come with a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Warm dishes, local specialities and juice are served as part of the breakfast offered at the property.

Guests at the bed and breakfast will be able to enjoy activities in and around Sharm El Sheikh, like snorkelling.

Tonino Lamborghini International Convention Center Sharm El Sheikh is 16 km from Serenity Lodge, while Ghibli Raceway is 16 km away. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport, 4 km from the accommodation.

Sharm Inn Amarein - Boutique Hotel.address: Hadabet Om Elseid, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Sharm Inn Amarein - Boutique Hotel.description:
Including an outdoor pool, Sharminn Amarein offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a balcony. Its private sand and coral beaches are 5 minutes’ drive away and a free shuttle is provided.

Different water sports are available at the private beaches. Guests can enjoy a shisha water pipe or fresh mint tea in the Bedouin beach tent. Temporary tattoos and Bedouin artwork are also available.

Sharm Inn’s spacious rooms come with a satellite TV, free Wi-Fi and a minibar. Each has a private bathroom with a tub and a shower. All are decorated with tiled floors and bright colours.

Relaxing massages are offered at Sharm Amarein’s spa, which includes a hot tub and a sauna. There is also a gym with cardiovascular equipment.

International buffet-style dishes are offered at this resort’s main restaurant. Sharm Inn Amarein - Boutique Hotel has an onsite seafood restaurant and a cocktail bar.

Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport is 35 minutes away, and a shuttle can be arranged on request.

Set in Sharm El Sheikh, 1.2 km from Sharm El Maya Bay Beach, New Regency Lodge Hotel offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Offering free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking hotel features an indoor pool and karaoke.

At the hotel every room includes air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with pool view. The units will provide guests with a fridge.

A buffet, continental or Italian breakfast is available every morning at the property.

Sinai Old Spices B&B.description:
Nestled at the foot of a rocky mountain, Sinai Old Spices is located in the Bedouin Village of Roissat. The themed hotel offers a getaway spot for travellers. It boasts air-conditioned rooms with a balcony.

All spice-themed rooms at Sinai Old Spices are simply furnished. Overlooking the city, each room comes with a flat-screen TV, a kitchenette and a private bathroom with free toiletries.

There is free Wi-Fi in public areas. Sinai Old Spices offers a garden and a terrace. Breakfast is served in the pool side restaurant.

The public Reef Beach is 5 km from the hotel. Naama Bay and Old Sharm are each 15 minutes’ drive away. A shuttle to Sharm El Sheikh International Airport is available upon request.

Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh Vill.address: 1 Four Seasons Boulevard, El-Salam, Qesm Sharm Ash Sheikh, South Sinai Governorate, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh Vill.description:
Located in Sharm El Sheikh and with Sharks Bay Beach reachable within less than 1 km, Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh Villa & Chalet - Private Residence provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a restaurant. 1.1 km from White Knight Bay Beach and less than 1 km from SOHO Square Sharm El Sheikh, the property features a private beach area, as well as a bar. The accommodation offers a kids' club, room service and currency exchange for guests.

The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a dishwasher, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh Villa & Chalet - Private Residence every room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options.

Guests can relax in the spa and wellness centre, including a fitness centre, a sauna and a hot tub, or in the garden equipped with a children's playground. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation.

Speaking Arabic, English and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the reception.

Ras Mohammed National Park is 48 km from Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh Villa & Chalet - Private Residence, while Tonino Lamborghini International Convention Center Sharm El Sheikh is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International, 3 km from the resort, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Pickalbatros Palace Sharm - \"Aqua Park\.address: Ras Nasrani, 45214 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Pickalbatros Palace Sharm - \"Aqua Park\.description:
The 5-star Albatros Palace Sharm - Pickalbatros Palace Sharm - "Aqua Park" located on the seafront with long jetty. Pickalbatros Palace Sharm - "Aqua Park" based on all inclusive concept. It offers a private beach,  six swimming pools connected by lakes and waterfalls, and panoramic views of Tiran Island. The property is a 5-minute drive from Soho Square and 15 minutes away by car from Naama Bay.Located on the seafront with a private sandy beach.The hotel is based on All-Inclusive concept.Hotel offers (Aqua Park - Kids Aqua Park) on site.It offers 11 outdoor swimming pools.All Rooms feature with balcony or terrace.A safety box and minibar.The hotel offers 7 restaurants including A La Carte menu.

The modern rooms and suites are situated in a prime location, along the shoreline. All units are spacious and include a flat-screen TV and furnished balconies with garden and sea views.

Pickalbatros Palace Sharm - "Aqua Park" facilities include a spa centre that offers massage treatments, a sauna and a well-equipped gym. Guests can also experience scuba diving and coral reef snorkeling activities nearby. Children can have fun at the playground and the dedicated swimming pool.

The luxury resort offers 3 cuisine restaurants, including one by the pool and another with a panoramic sea view from the terrace. Cocktails and light snacks are served at the Gabi Pool Bar & Restaurant and the Tiran View beach bar.

Free Wi-Fi is available in the lobby. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can organise rental cars and free parking is available on site. Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport is 2.5 km away.

Guests can enjoy a dine-around concept at the 4 buffet restaurants in the hotel.

Swimming in the pool or in the sea is only permitted in adequate bathing suit. Swimming in loose/cotton clothing is not permitted.

Verginia Sharm Resort & Aqua Park.address: El Motelat St.,El Hadaba, 45214 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Verginia Sharm Resort & Aqua Park.description:
Located in a quiet part of Sharm El Sheikh, Verginia Sharm Resort & Aqua Park features a large pool with waterfall and fountains and a spa.

The rooms have a balcony while the suites have views of the pool area and palm trees. Each air-conditioned unit is fitted with a satellite TV, minibar and free Wi-Fi.

Among the hotel’s facilities is a gym for guests who want to work out. The health club with spa bath, hammam and sauna offers relaxation afterwards.

Verginia Sharm Resort & Aqua Park offers a diving centre enabling guests to explore the magnificent underwater landscape and fauna of the Red Sea. Children can play safely in the kids pool.

A professional animation team takes care of entertaining children throughout the day. In the night time, live animations shows can be enjoyed at the hotel’s amphitheatre.

There are 2 restaurants on the property that serve a wide variety of food, including international, oriental and seafood specialities. The Ghadamas Bar offers live music and cocktails.

The corals and reefs of Ras Mohamed National Park are 65 km from the Verginia. Sharm el Sheikh International Airport  is just a 15-minute drive away. Free on-site private parking is available.

Now we have 2 swimming pools, one Family pool with Aqua Park and the other Quiet Pool for Adults only (+16).

Regency Blueberry hotel.address: Sharm Al Sheikh - Raas Mohammed, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Regency Blueberry hotel.description:
Located 1.2 km from Sharm El Maya Bay Beach, Regency Blueberry hotel offers a private beach area, pool with a view and accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. With pool views, this accommodation provides a balcony. The indoor pool features a pool bar and fence.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a kettle, a walk-in shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The private bathroom is equipped with a bidet. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, vegetarian and halal options. Guests can chill out in the on-site bar, while a minimarket is also available.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Ras Um El Sid Beach is 1.7 km from the apartment, while Reef Beach is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport, 16 km from Regency Blueberry hotel.

Amphoras Beach.address: Om El Seid Cliff, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Amphoras Beach.description:
Situated on the beachfront, Amphoras Beach features 6 swimming pools and beautifully landscaped gardens. It offers a restaurant, volleyball, darts, boccia, ping pong, beach racket and several spa facilities.

Amphoras Beach is 18 km from Sharm El Sheikh International Airport, and a 15-minute drive from Naama Bay Centre.

The spacious guest rooms combine Islamic architecture with modern design and have a marble bathroom with a bathtub. All rooms feature private terraces with panoramic views over the gardens, the pool area, or the Red Sea.

The Vita Moor Spa offers a wide range of facial treatments, massages ( Thai, Shiatsu, Egyptian or Indian Hot Oil ), exotic body wraps, and scrubs. A fitness center, indoor hot tub, sauna, Hammam and steam room are also available.

Amphoras Restaurant serves a range of cuisines including international and oriental. The Orient Restaurant serves oriental food on the beach area. Italian cuisine fans can enjoy The Bella Vista restaurant.

Hotel Novotel Sharm El-Sheikh.address: Naama Bay, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Hotel Novotel Sharm El-Sheikh.description:
Situated in Sharm El-Sheikh, this hotel is located within Naama Bay. It has a private beach, 5 swimming pools, and offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV.

Rooms at the Novotel Sharm El-Sheikh have tiled floors and elegant furnishings. They come equipped with a minibar, as well as tea and coffee making facilities. Some rooms feature balconies with panoramic views.

The property has two wings "Beach Wing" located at the side of the beach and "Palm Wing" located on the other side across the road.

The Novotel has 3 restaurants that serve a variety of regional and international cuisine. Al Dente offers Italian fare and views of the Red Sea. The Bedu Bar provides live entertainment.

Guests can enjoy a relaxing massage, or visit the fitness centre. The hotel also has a games room with table tennis, and a children’s playground.

Novotel Sharm El-Sheikh is less than 10 km from Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport. The hotel offers 24-hour front desk service, and free private on-site parking.

Amphoras Blu.description:
Featuring a private front beach, this property features a large outdoor pool with sun-lounger terrace and modern rooms with balconies overlooking the gardens, swimming pool or Red Sea.

Amphoras Blu Resort's air-conditioned rooms come equipped with a minibar, TV with international channels and a spacious marble bathroom including a hairdryer and amenities.

Guests of Amphoras Blu can sunbathe on the palm-shaded, seaside terrace or get sporty while playing tennis. There is also a hot tub, sauna and gym for work-outs. Guests have free use the aqua park of the sister property.

The Amphoras Blu Main Restaurant serves international meals, themed buffets and oriental BBQs.

Amphoras Blu is 18 km south from International Airport and 7 km away from Naama Bay. Also, it is 4 km from Downtown.

This beachfront property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The apartment offers a pool with sea views, beauty services and a 24-hour front desk.

Boasting a DVD player, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a toaster, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 2 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower and a bath. The unit is air conditioned and is comprised of a balcony with an outdoor dining area as well as a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and is protected by full-day security.

A family-friendly restaurant, coffee shop and bar can be found on-site.

The area is popular for hiking, and car hire is available at the apartment. Kids pool is also available for guests at Sharks Bay Oasis Apartment.

SOHO Square Sharm El Sheikh is 2.3 km from the accommodation, while Ras Mohammed National Park is 49 km from the property. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International, 5 km from Sharks Bay Oasis Apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Naama Blue Hotel.address: King Abd Allah Street, Naama Bay, 11234 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Naama Blue Hotel.description:
Naama Blue Hotel is located at the southern end of Naama Bay, the main resort centre of Sharm El Sheikh. The hotel enjoys a prime position just a few minutes stroll from the sandy beaches of Naama Bay and all the popular restaurants, clubs, bars & shops. It is also nicely set back against the hills slightly away from the hustle and bustle of the main street.

Featuring a city or a mountain view, the air-conditioned rooms are bright and painted in calm tones. Each includes a flat-screen TV, a minibar and safety deposit box.

The hotel has a large swimming pool with sun terrace and sun beds. There is a pool bar for day time refreshment as well as the lobby bar serving drinks & cocktails through the day and the main restaurant where buffet meals are served.

The property offers an to access to a private sandy beach only a few minutes away on foot. There is also an excursions desk based in the hotel for your activities and snorkelling needs.

Sentido Reef Oasis Aqua Park Resort.description:
Situated on a beach overlooking Temple Reef, this all-inclusive resort has spacious rooms with a balcony. It features outdoor pools, a wellness centre, and panoramic views of Sinai Mountains and Tiran Island.

This 5-star hotel includes a diving pool, 3 heated pools, and 2 pools for children. There is an Aqua Park with 14 pools. Snorkelling and diving is possible on the beach. It has 9 restaurants and 15 bars.

The air-conditioned rooms at Reef Oasis are contemporary decorated with dark wooden furnishing. Each room comes with a TV and a minibar. Some rooms have a flat-screen TV and a separate seating area.

The hotel’s restaurant serves local dishes, while the bar offers refreshing drinks.

The wellness centre provides a range of beauty treatments and massages. Guests can relax in the hot tub or stroll through the lush gardens.

Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport is 16 km away, and the hotel offers free public parking on site.

Rixos Sharm El Sheikh - Ultra All Inclus.address: Nabq Bay, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Rixos Sharm El Sheikh - Ultra All Inclus.description:
Rixos Sharm El Sheikh Resort is located on seafront among palm trees. It features free WiFi in all areas, a sandy beach, 7 swimming pools, 7 à-la-carte restaurants and 9 bars. Private butler services are offered at the private beach and pool cabanas at an added fee.

All rooms at Rixos come with a balcony or terrace overlooking the sea, garden or pool. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV, a minibar, a wardrobe and a telephone. Some rooms include a spacious seating area.

Guests can enjoy an authentic Turkish, Japanese, Seafood and Brazilian dining experience at
Lalezar, Sakura, Salt and La Churrascaria restaurants. Gusto restaurant serves Italian cuisine from à la carte menu, while Asian and Taj Mahal offer Asian and Indian dishes. The resort offers evening entertainment options, spacious entertainment area and open-air club X Lounge.

Guests can enjoy a dine-around concept at the 16 a la carte restaurants in both Rixos hotels.

Rixos’ spa offers a range of relaxation options, including full-body massages and facials. There is also a modern gym equipped with state-of-the-art cardiovascular equipment. The property also includes 3 water slides.

Exclusive Sports Club offers a range of work out programs like CrossFit, spinning, Pilates, Aqua Bike, Aqua Jumping and gravity Yoga. Other activities include tennis, beach volleyball and snorkelling.

Rixos Aquaventure Park features 6 towers with 23 water slides, large interactive Water Fountains, Aqua Tower, Lazy River and the Wave Pool.

Guests at Rixos Sharm El Sheikh Resort can enjoy Go Karts, Artificial Zoo, Carousel, Ferris Wheel  on site.

Naama Bay, with its promenade, is 22 km away from Rixos Sharm El Sheikh. Sharm El Sheikh International Airport is 8 km drive away. A complimentary shuttle bus is available to Naama Bay promenade.

Free access is available to Rixos Aquaventure Park for all Rixos Sharm El Sheikh guests.
which is located in Rixos Premium Seagate.

Other services and facilities offered at Rixos Sharm El Sheikh Resort include sister property Rixos Premium Seagate entire area, bars, beaches, pools and restaurants.

Sunrise Diamond Beach Resort -Grand Sele.address: Hadabat Om El Sid, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Sunrise Diamond Beach Resort -Grand Sele.description:
Situated on Om El Seid Plateau, SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort -Grand Select has a private beach. It features 5 à-la-carte restaurants,1 open buffet restaurant, 4 swimming pools, an Aqua park and a diving school. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Guests can choose between wide varieties of rooms. A special benefit for families is the Family Suite concept, which offers separate rooms for parents and children. All guest rooms at SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort -Grand Select- are equipped with satellite TV, an en suite bathroom and a mini-refrigerator.

Guests can enjoy a variety of dining venues, including the Oriental Restaurant located on the beach, and Italian restaurant and the stylish Manohar Indian restaurant. There are also 12 bars, providing a choice of relaxing spots in which to enjoy a drink.

The resort offers a spa and fitness center and an international diving center, where you can explore the colorful reefs and exotic fish of the Red Sea.

SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort -Grand Select- is 20 km from Sharm el Sheikh International Airport.  Free on-site car parking is available.

SUNRISE Posh Club is a luxury boutique product of the international hotel brand SUNRISE Resorts & Cruises. The Posh Club offers high-level services and experiences to its guests.

Exclusive service for Posh Club guests begins with a VIP airport pick-up and check-in at the hotel takes place right at the suite.

It’s time to surround yourself in a wealth of blissful ambience and allow our Posh Club suites to treat you to a serving of luxury.

Jaz Fanara Resort.description:
Jaz Fanara Resort is Green Star certified hotel, located in a prime position on the cliff of Ras Om El Sid with a breathtaking view of the Red Sea and the national park of Ras Mohamed and only minutes away from Naama bay.

Rooms at Jaz Fanara are air-conditioned and equipped with a satellite TV. Some offer spacious living room areas and sea views from private balconies. This 4 star hotel is especially suitable for couples although there are well appointed family rooms available.

Guests can choose among indoor and outdoor dining possibilities at El Medina and Temple Pool Restaurant, serving traditional Arabic cuisine. Jaz Fanara also offers a beach bar. In addition to breakfast, lunch and dinner, all-inclusive rates include house-alcoholic beverages.

Guests can feel light and beautiful with the spa, which includes offers reviving and reinvigorating treatments, massage, sand relaxation programs and beauty services at an extra charge. Alternatively, you can enjoy playing tennis, snorkeling free of charge or diving with an added charge.

The Jaz Fanara Resort is only 2 km from Sharm city centre and 22 km from Sharm El Sheikh International Airport

Grand Oasis Resort.address: Sharks Bay, 99999 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Grand Oasis Resort.description:
This resort features a free form 2 outdoor pools and a children's swimming pool with panoramic views of the Red Sea. Located on Sharks Bay beach, it offers bright accommodation and a private beach with loungers and umbrellas. Soho Square is a 5-minute walk away.

Grand Oasis Resort’s rooms are spacious and fitted with full-length windows, all of which open onto a private balcony. Each air-conditioned room has a work desk and TV with multilingual cable channels.

At the Grand Oasis, guests can relax in the large pool, enjoy shisha or unwind with a cocktail from the poolside bar or the lobby bar. For a vigorous workout, the hotel provides a well-equipped gym, beach volleyball and sports courts.

Grand Oasis Resort is 9 km from popular Naama Bay, offering plenty of restaurants and shops. Sharm el Sheikh Airport is 8.9 km away.

Charmillion Club Resort.address: Nabq Bay, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Charmillion Club Resort.description:
Located along Nabq Bay, the all-inclusive Charmillion Club Resort has a private beach with a coral reef and 3 restaurants. It offers an outdoor pool and large rooms with a balcony.

All modern and air-conditioned rooms at Charmillion Club Resort Sharm El Sheikh come a minibar and a satellite TV. Each also offers a spacious bathroom with a shower.

Breakfast is served in Charmillion Club Resort's buffet restaurant. Il Pescatore provides seafood and beachfront dining. There is 24-hour all-inclusive service and a dine-around concept, where guests can eat and drink at bars in Charmillion Group Resorts' sister hotels.

Guests can undergo a massage in the spa or enjoy a sauna or steam bath session. Sporty visitors can play tennis or go diving. Kids will have fun in the children’s pool and with the Kid’s Club.

Steigenberger Alcazar.address: Nabq Bay, 99999 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Steigenberger Alcazar.description:
Steigenberger Alcazar is the latest venue in Nabq around 15 minutes from Sharm El-Sheikh International Airport. This five-star resort enjoys 30 000 sqm of its own private beach with  underwater scenery and 3 swimming pools which are heated during the winter. Guests can enjoy free WiFi throughout the property and in the rooms.

Steigenberger Alcazar offers 584 guest rooms. Superior Rooms and Deluxe Family Rooms stand just off the beach while Villas and Junior Suites accommodate larger groups.

The Alcazar offers two main restaurants serving breakfast, lunch and dinner and five specialty a la carte restaurants. In addition there are two lobby bars, pool bars and a beach bar.

For children, the animation team guarantees fun and activities from the moment they arrive either in their private pools or at the fully supervised kids club. Adults can enjoy multiple treatments in Mividaspa.

Ras Mohammed National Park is 55 km from Steigenberger Alcazar, while center of Nabq Bay is 400 m from the property. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport, 13 km from the property.

Sunrise Arabian Beach Resort.address: Sharks Bay, Entrance of Convention Center, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Sunrise Arabian Beach Resort.description:
Located along with its private beach in the famous area of Sharks Bay, the SUNRISE Arabian Beach Resort is surrounded by gardens and offers a variety of facilities, including a spa. This property offers 6 a-la-carte restaurants. Free WiFi is available throughout the resort.

Featuring a private balcony or terrace, each modern room at the SUNRISE Arabian Beach Resort. is elegantly decorated in Arabian style. They all come with air conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, and an en-suite bathroom.

Guests can enjoy the large variety of menus available in the resort, from Indian “Manohar“, Thai “Mai Thai”, Italian “Basilico”,  French “Côte d’Azur”, Greek "Poseidon", Sea Food "Felucca" and International buffet at the Waterfall Grill. A lounge bar and a coffee shop are also available.

Including a hot tub, a steam room and a sauna, the wellness centre is the perfect spot to relax and recover energies. Massages on the beach, a well-equipped gym, and the selection of water sports are also on the large list of services.

Overlooking Tiran Island, the resort is 11 km from Naama Bay. Soho Square is 8 km away. Sharm El Sheikh International Airport is 9 km away.

White Hills Resort.address: 96A, Ra’s Nasrani, Sharks Bay, Sharm El Sheikh, South Sinai, 46628 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
White Hills Resort.description:
Set in Sharm El Sheikh, 4.2 km from SOHO Square Sharm El Sheikh, White Hills Resort offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Boasting room service, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a kids' club and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the resort, each room includes a wardrobe. The rooms come with a safety deposit box, while some rooms also feature a balcony. All guest rooms at White Hills Resort feature air conditioning and a desk.

The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play billiards and darts at the 5-star resort.

Ras Mohammed National Park is 42 km from White Hills Resort, while Tonino Lamborghini International Convention Center Sharm El Sheikh is 7.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport, 2 km from the resort.

Renaissance Sharm El Sheikh Golden View.address: Om El Seid Hill, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Renaissance Sharm El Sheikh Golden View.description:
Renaissance Sharm El Sheikh, a Marriott International property, is a luxury resort with 350 meters beachfront. It offers the chance of discovering the Red Sea underwater world. Free Wi-Fi service is available in public areas as well as guest rooms.

The resort comprises 384 smoke-free guest rooms and suites fully equipped with means of comfort like 42” flat-screen TV with comprehensive IPTV system, tea & coffee making facilities, minibar for a fee, iron & iron board, desk and chair. Guests can request interconnecting rooms and suites.

Guests can enjoy Coast main buffet restaurant, Calamari Seafood Market Restaurant, Italian restaurant Ristorante La Casa Pizza & Pasta and 4 bars. Entertainment program by the night.

The resort presents many facilities & activities: 3 swimming pools (1 heated in winter). Onsite diving centre, gym, Spa and kids playground. Stretch out exercises by the beach. MICE facilities.

A limousine service is available at an extra fee. Sharm El Sheikh International Airport is 20 km away from the property.

Maritim Jolie Ville Resort & Casino.address: Naama Bay, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Maritim Jolie Ville Resort & Casino.description:
Right on Naama Bay’s promenade, this 5-star resort boasts its own sandy beach and a casino. Relax in the Thai spa and enjoy 9 restaurants. Wi-Fi and parking are free.

All elegant rooms at Maritim Jolie Ville feature private balconies or terraces. Each is equipped with a minibar, satellite TV and in-room tea-and-coffee-making facilities.

Dining options at this resort include French, Italian and international restaurants, along with a beach bar and a pool terrace.  The Seagull's Pub offers daily live music and shows for entertainment.

The spa at Maritim Jolie Ville Resort & Casino features a range of massages and body treatments. The beach facilities provide opportunities for deep sea diving and paragliding.

 The hotel is situated 20 minutes drive from Sharm El Sheikh International Airport. Numerous shops, restaurants and nightlife are only steps away.

Rixos Golf Villas And Suites Sharm El Sh.address: El Salam Road, PO Box 232 Egypt, 46619 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Rixos Golf Villas And Suites Sharm El Sh.description:
Located in Sharm El Sheikh, 5.8 km from SOHO Square Sharm El Sheikh, Rixos Golf Villas And Suites Sharm El Sheikh provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna and a hammam. The property features a spa centre, evening entertainment and room service.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms are equipped with a kettle, while some rooms are equipped with a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. At Rixos Golf Villas And Suites Sharm El Sheikh each room is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and Full English/Irish options.

Speaking Arabic, English, Russian and Turkish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help.

Tonino Lamborghini International Convention Center Sharm El Sheikh is 350 metres from the accommodation, while Ras Mohammed National Park is 45 km away. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport, 8 km from Rixos Golf Villas And Suites Sharm El Sheikh.

Domina Coral Bay - Private One Bedroom A.address: Marsa El Dekhela, 46628 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Domina Coral Bay - Private One Bedroom A.description:
Featuring sea views, Domina Coral Bay - Private One Bedroom Aparthotel offers accommodation with a casino, free bikes and a garden, around less than 1 km from Domina Coral Bay Beach. This beachfront property offers access to a balcony, table tennis, and free WiFi. The aparthotel features an outdoor swimming pool with a pool bar, as well as spa facilities and a 24-hour front desk.

The unit is air conditioned and includes a terrace with an outdoor dining area as well as a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and is protected by full-day security.

At the aparthotel, the family-friendly restaurant is open for dinner, lunch and brunch and serves Indian cuisine.

Yoga classes and fitness classes are organised at the fitness room on site. For guests with children, Domina Coral Bay - Private One Bedroom Aparthotel provides kids pool, an indoor play area and outdoor play equipment. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy darts on-site, or go snorkelling or cycling in the surroundings.

SOHO Square Sharm El Sheikh is 8.4 km from Domina Coral Bay - Private One Bedroom Aparthotel, while Ras Mohammed National Park is 41 km away. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International, 10 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Reef Oasis Beach Aqua Park Resort.address: Marine Sports Street, Hadbet Um El Sied, 46619 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Reef Oasis Beach Aqua Park Resort.description:
Featuring a landscaped pool area with 13 pools, this resort has air-conditioned rooms with balconies overlooking the Red Sea or the pools. It features a private beach and a tennis court.

Surrounded by the Sinai Mountains, Reef Oasis Beach Resort offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV. Each room is decorated in neutral colours and has modern furnishing.

Reef Oasis has 6 restaurants serving Italian and grilled dishes, among a wide range of specialties. There are 10 bars, some of which serves drinks during the day, while others offer entertainment in the evening.

Guests can relax on the sun loungers by the pools, or use the fitness centre. Younger guests can visit the Nemo’s Kids Club. Reef’s spa offers range of spa facilities, including a hot tub, a sauna, and massage treatments.

Sharm el-Sheik International Airport is 14 km away, and the resort offers free parking on site.

DoubleTree by Hilton Sharks Bay Resort.address: Sharks Bay, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
DoubleTree by Hilton Sharks Bay Resort.description:
Surrounded by palm trees, just 5 km from Sharm El Sheikh Airport, DoubleTree by Hilton Sharks Bay Resort features private beach, family entertainment and a range of leisure activities and water sports.

All rooms are feature a private balcony. It includes a flat-screen TV and a fridge. The bathroom is fitted with a bath and a bathrobe.

DoubleTree by Hilton Sharks Bay Resort boasts 7 outdoor pools, with plenty of space to relax around the terrace. Guests can keep up with their fitness routines using the high-tech gym facilities, followed by a massage with views of the Red Sea.

The Red Sea coast can be explored with the guidance of the onsite professional diving centre. Children will be kept entertained at the kid’s club, their shaded pool area and entertainment from the animation team.

The resort offers a variety of cuisines from 13 restaurant and bars. In the evenings, the Restaurants serve delicious dishes, while the Bar features Red Sea views and cocktails.

Dive Inn Resort.address: 34 Alferouseya Street, 46619 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Dive Inn Resort.description:
Nestled in tropical gardens, this 4-star resort features a diving centre with professional instructors on the Red Sea shore. It offers a free beach bus to Um El Seid Gulf.

The lagoon-style outdoor pool of Dive Inn Resort is surrounded by tall palms and charming ponds. After a session with the experienced trainers of the fitness centre, guests can enjoy a sauna or a massage.

All rooms at Dive Inn Resort feature a private balcony or terrace overlooking the pool area. Each room includes satellite TV, a spacious wardrobe and a dressing table with mirror.

A choice of buffet and à la carte specialties are offered at the main restaurant, which overlooks the pool area. Freshly squeezed juices and sandwiches can be enjoyed by the pool, while the Nagham Night Club provides Egyptian music and dance.

The lively Naama Bay is just 10 minutes away from Dive Inn, while Sharm el-Sheikh Airport is 15 km away.

Desert View Sharm Hotel.address: El Moteilat Street- Om El Seid Hill, 99999 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Desert View Sharm Hotel.description:
Desert View Sharm Hotel is situated in Um El Sid Cliff, 6 km from the Naema Bay promenade with its restaurants and cafés. It features an outdoor pool.

All accommodation at Desert View Sharm Hotel feature a terrace overlooking the garden and pool. Each room offers a satellite TV, a wardrobe and a minibar. The suite includes a separate living room with sofa.

A buffet-style breakfast is served daily, while à-la-carte specialties are served in the evening. The hotel can serve breakfast in the room. Room service is available 24 hours.

Old Market that sells traditional garments and items is 2 km drive away from Desert View Sharm Hotel. The sea can be reached within a 10-minute walk.

Pyramisa Beach Resort Sharm El Sheikh.address: Sharks Bay , 99999 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Pyramisa Beach Resort Sharm El Sheikh.description:
Pyramisa Beach Resort Sharm El Sheikh is located in Sharm El Sheikh and features its own private beach overlooking the Red Sea. The resort has 2 outdoor swimming pools with sun terrace and an indoor swimming pool.

The rooms and suites are air-conditioned and feature a balcony. They include a minibar and a seating area with a TV, as well as a safety deposit box.

Pyramisa Beach Resort Sharm El Sheikh has 3 restaurants serving Italian, Indian and international cuisine. The lobby has several seating areas and a 24-hour front desk. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas.

Sharm El Sheikh International Airport is 7.5 km away. Naama Bay is 20 minutes by car from the resort. Public parking is available.

Sierra Sharm El Sheikh.address: Soho Square, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Sierra Sharm El Sheikh.description:
This 5-star all-inclusive resort is situated in the centre of Soho Square, it offers access to the private sands of White Knight Beach.

Sierra Sharm El Sheikh features 8 swimming pools and water sports centre providing gear for parasailing, windsurfing and water-skiing. There is also a gym and tennis courts.

Rooms come with balconies or patios overlooking the garden or pool. Each has satellite TV and a minibar.  Bathrooms include make-up mirrors and hairdryers.

Sierra Sharm El Sheikh’s spa offers a broad variety of body treatments, reflexology and massages at a surcharge. Guests can relax in the steam bath, sauna or hot tub, and there is a rooftop rest area with parasols.

Guests can enjoy an all-inclusive open buffet at Mountain View. Akuna Matata offers a variety of Mexican, Italian, and Egyptian Cuisines along with Chinese Noodles & American burgers. Refreshments and snacks can be found at the property's 8 bars.

Sheraton Sharm Hotel, Resort, Villas & S.address: Al Pasha Coast,, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Sheraton Sharm Hotel, Resort, Villas & S.description:
•	Indulge in the vibrant energy of Sharm EL Sheikh City, the beating heart of South Sinai, at Sheraton Sharm Hotel, Resort, Villas and Spa. Sheraton Sharm Hotel is a stunning beachfront resort, located at Al Pasha Coast, nestled on the east shore of the southernmost tip of the Sinai Peninsula, one of the world’s most beautiful coral reefs and overlooking the famed dive and snorkeling sites, with a horizon of Tiran Island.
•	The hotel carries you through a memorable journey where the desert stops at the Seashore. Take in sweeping views of the breathtaking scenery from the comfort of our well-appointed 300 superior Seafront guestrooms, including 18 opulent suites, all rooms and suites are generously sized with space for an extra bed and living area, and some rooms are interconnecting. All rooms and suites have private balconies or terrace with spectacular views of the beach and sea or with private garden.
•	Explore measureless varieties of recreational facilities including 800-meter long beach, 2 spectacular swimming pools heated in Winter, in addition to diving pool and children’s pool, a volleyball court, kids club. Stay fit at our state-of-the-art Fitness Center, rejuvenate in our Spa Center with 16 treatment rooms, daily animation team and live evening entertainment.
•	After a long day of exploring, savor a wide variety of the finest dishes at our 5 restaurants indoors and outdoors; White Cruiser restaurant International cuisine with theme nights- buffet style all day dining, Dar El Qamar Lebanese and Oriental restaurant, Portofino Italian Restaurant ,  Pool restaurant offers international cuisine and delicious sandwiches and Hugo’s beach restaurant offers Catch of the Day Seafood dishes, and 3 bars for refreshing cocktails and light snacks, all bars and café are sea view overlooking the breathtaking scenery.
•	Sheraton Sharm Hotel presents a new dynamic dining experience where guests can “Dine Around” at our A La Carte Restaurants throughout the stay. Half Board and All Inclusive Guests are welcomed to experience our signatures restaurants for a memorable culinary experience.
•	We look forward to welcoming you to Sheraton Sharm Hotel, Resort, Villas & Spa.

Meraki Resort Sharm El Sheikh Adults onl.description:
Facing the beachfront, Meraki Resort Sharm El Sheikh Adults only offers 5-star accommodation in Sharm El Sheikh and features a garden, terrace and restaurant. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The resort has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, nightclub and a shared lounge.

At the resort, rooms come with a wardrobe. Meraki Resort Sharm El Sheikh Adults only offers some units with garden views, and all rooms have a balcony. At the accommodation, all rooms include air conditioning and a safety deposit box.

You can play billiards and darts at Meraki Resort Sharm El Sheikh Adults only.

SOHO Square Sharm El Sheikh is 4.2 km from the resort, while Ras Mohammed National Park is 42 km from the property. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International, 2 km from Meraki Resort Sharm El Sheikh Adults only, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Xperience Kiroseiz Parkland.address: Peace Road, Naama Bay, 99999 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Xperience Kiroseiz Parkland.description:
Located 1 km from scenic Naama Bay, this all-inclusive resort offers an aquapark with 6 swimming pools, including 2 heated ones. It operates a free shuttle to a private beach on the Red Sea.

All air-conditioned rooms at Xperience Kiroseiz Parkland are fitted with contemporary furnishings. They come with a private balcony or terrace with a pool or garden view. Free refill of the in-room minibar is provided once per stay.

Guests can relax on sun loungers around the pool or dip in to cool off. The separate children’s section has slides. At the spa, relaxing massages are provided, along with a hot tub and sauna.

Active leisure facilities include a tennis court and well-equipped gym. There is also a games room offering table tennis, darts and billiards. Premium 24 hours all inclusive concept.

The hotel features 2 buffet and 1 à-la-carte restaurant, and 4 bars serving alcoholic beverages and snacks. For night-time entertainment it offers a night club.

Naama Bay, with its promenade, is 1 km away from Xperience Kiroseiz Parkland. Sharm El Sheikh International Airport is 6 km drive away. Shuttle bus transfer to/from Naama Bay & Soho Square available onsite with extra charge ( fixed times).

Sultan Gardens Resort.address: Sharks Bay, 99999 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Sultan Gardens Resort.description:
This 5-star resort features a private sandy beach with overwater decks on the Sharks Bay. It boasts 5 palm-framed freshwater pools offering full views of the Tiran Island. One of the pools is for adults only and offers an open air Jacuzzi and a swim-up bar.

5 restaurants are available at Sultan Gardens Resort, offering home-made pasta, Cajun cuisine and live cooking shows, the “House Of Spice” Indian restaurant.

The resort also features a 24-hour coffee shop with an ice parlour, and a lounge bar with 2 big screens. At the Shallal Bar, you can taste freshly squeezed juices and daily snacks.

Guests can schedule massage treatments at Sultan’s spa, or relax on a wooden lounger on the poolside. Children can have fun on the waterslide or on the playground, or enjoy the activities of the kids’ club.

Air-conditioned rooms at Sultan Gardens offer a brightly coloured décor with wooden furnishing. TVs with satellite channels are available in each room.

Sultan Gardens is 6 km from Soho Square and 8 km from Naama Bay. Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport is 6 km from the resort. A shuttle service is provided upon charge.

Naama Bay Promenade Beach Resort Managed.address: Naama Bay El Salam Road, 12311 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Naama Bay Promenade Beach Resort Managed.description:
Situated in the heart of the popular Naama Bay, Naama Bay Promenade Beach Resort Managed By Accor offers spacious accommodation overlooking the hotel's tropical gardens, the extensive pool or beach panoramic view. It also features a private beach. Guests can enjoy free WiFi in the public areas of the hotel.

Featuring 520 units, the resort is divided between the beach side and the Mountain "garden" side with spectacular views of the sea, pool and gardens. All of the property's air-conditioned rooms are spacious and fitted with en suite bathroom with bathtub. Each unit comes with a minibar and safe box, while beach side rooms also feature flat-screen TVs.

Naama Bay Promenade Beach Resort Managed By Accor’s well-equipped gym offers guests the chance to keep fit or to relax in the sauna and the steam room. Sun beds around the hotel’s large, outdoor pool offer ample space to bathe in the sun.

Dining options comprise a buffet restaurant along with Japanese and Italian specialty restaurants. Beach BBQ hosts live entertainment, while Piano bar serves drinks all evening. Guests can also enjoy unlimited soft drinks and water along with their meals in the buffet restaurants.

Sharm El Sheikh International Airport is only 10 km away from the property. The hotel provides free parking.

Sunrise Montemare Resort -Grand Select.address: El Fanar Street, Om El Sed Cliff, 33735 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Sunrise Montemare Resort -Grand Select.description:
Located in Sharm El Sheikh, SUNRISE Montemare Resort -Grand Select- features 4 outdoor pools, a private beach and a restaurant.

All rooms come with a balcony or a terrace overlooking the Garden or the Sea. Each has flat-screen TV and air conditioning. There is also an electric kettle. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and bathrobes.

At SUNRISE Montemare Resort -Grand Select- you will find an international buffet restaurant and 4 a la carte restaurants. Manzoku offers tastes from Asia including sushi bar, Teppanyaki and woks. Seafood can be enjoyed at Felucca Restaurant and Italian food can be savoured at Basilico Italian Restaurant. At the Gamila Restaurant you can enjoy oriental food.

The Spa center includes sauna, steam room and Turkish bath. Massages and body treatments can be arranged, as well as personalized wellness programmes. Hair and beauty centre is also featured.

Free WiFi access is available in all areas. Naama Bay is 10 km away. Sharm El-Sheikh International Airport is 22 km away. An airport shuttle is available upon request.

SUNRISE Posh Club is a luxury boutique product of the international hotel brand SUNRISE Resorts & Cruises. The Posh Club offers high-level services and experiences to its guests.
Exclusive service for Posh Club guests begins with a VIP airport pick-up and check-in at the hotel takes place right at the suite.
It’s time to surround yourself in a wealth of blissful ambience and allow our Posh Club suites to treat you to a serving of luxury.

The Posh Club is designed to make everything about your stay with us as convenient as possible, with our expert butlers dedicated to fulfilling your needs.

Warm and discreet, our Posh Club team of butlers is at hand to make your holiday as comfortable as possible. They'll personally handle everything from unpacking suitcases and organizing on-resort activities to arranging special experiences and tailored celebrations.

You are entitled to the Posh Club Treatment upon booking a Suite , some of the priviliges are Butler Service ,Concierge Service 24-Hours , Business Centre Services ,Free Digital Newspaper and  20% Discount on future bookings in Sister Hotels.

Upon booking a Suite you can also access complimentary transfer from and to the Airport and coujnt ,express Check-In and Early Check-In (subject to availabilty) just as  Express Check-Out and Late Check-Out (subject to availabilty).

Falcon Hills Hotel.address: Motels Street. Um El Sid, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Falcon Hills Hotel.description:
Overlooking Sinai Mountains, Falcon Hills Hotel offers value-for-money accommodation with 2 beaches nearby. It features 2 outdoor pools, tennis courts and a spa with massage treatments.

Located in the Ras Umsid Plateau, the hotel provides diving equipment to explore the coral reefs of the Red Sea. Amphora Beach is only 750 metres away, while Falcon Hills’ private beach is connected by a free shuttle service.

Rooms all open out on to a private balcony and are equipped with a satellite TV. En-suite bathrooms come with bathtub or a shower, and air conditioning is standard.

Guests can benefit from 24-hour refreshments and a pool bar. Popular Na’ama Bay is also connected with a free shuttle service. Sharm el Sheik Airport is 17 km away, and free private parking is available at the hotel.

Sunrise Remal Resort.address: El Montazah Area,Ras Nosrani, 99999 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Sunrise Remal Resort.description:
Located in Sharm el-Sheikh’s exclusive Montazah area, this 4-star hotel offers stunning views of the Red Sea and the Sinai Mountains. A free bus takes guests to the hotel’s private beach.

Tiran Island Hotel Sharm El Sheikh’s well-lit rooms are decorated with wooden furniture. All rooms have satellite TV, a minibar and a balcony with panoramic views of the surroundings. Some rooms have a separate seating area.

Tiran Island features 7 different restaurants and bars. À la carte restaurant House of Curry offers authentic Indian dishes. Piazza Café serves a selection of teas and coffees with live entertainment in the evenings.

Guests can go diving at Tiran’s diving centre, or relax by the outdoor pool. The hotel also offers a multi-purpose sports court and extensive water sports activities.

Tiran Island’s entertainment team organises live shows with music and dance at the amphitheatre. Kids can have fun at the children’s pool or the indoor mini club.

The Sharm El Sheikh International Airport is only 2 km away from the hotel. Free private parking is available on site.

Jaz Mirabel Resort.address: Nabq Bay, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Jaz Mirabel Resort.description:
Located in Sharm El Sheikh, 1.4 km from Royal Albatros Moderna Beach, Jaz Mirabel Resort provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring a kids' club, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation features evening entertainment and room service.

At the resort, every room comes with a balcony. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, certain units at Jaz Mirabel Resort also provide guests with a sea view. All units will provide guests with air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV.

The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis, darts, and tennis at the 5-star resort.

Speaking Arabic, German, English and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the reception.

Nabq Bay Beach is 1.5 km from Jaz Mirabel Resort, while Steigenberger Alcazar Beach is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport, 13 km from the resort.

Viva Sharm.description:
Located at the famous Ras Um Sid plateau with a reef beach and diving site only 350 metres away, this hotel boasts air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony.

The guest rooms at Viva Sharm Hotel are decorated with care in natural tones. Each room includes a minibar and a private bathroom with a bathtub and shower.

Guests can relax on the palm-shaded terraces by the swimming pool or stay on their balcony to read a book or newspaper. For relaxation, the hotel offers a sauna, gym and Turkish steam bath.

Sharm Club Beach Resort.address: Ras Om el Sid, Sharm El Sheikh, South Sinai., 99999 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Sharm Club Beach Resort.description:
Overlooking Sharm Club Beach Resort in Sharm, this 4-star hotel offers panoramic views of the turquoise Red Sea and the Sinai Mountains. Facilities include a 700-metre beach and an outdoor pool.

The architectural style of Sharm Club Beach Resort resembles a traditional Egyptian village. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, cable TV, and a fridge. Some feature a balcony and a bathtub.

Guests can enjoy traditional Egyptian, as well as international dishes at the restaurant. A buffet breakfast is served every morning.

Sharm Club Beach Resort offers opportunities to go snorkelling and diving at Sharm Club Beach Resort. The hotel also has a tennis court and a spa with hot tub, Turkish bath and massage facilities. Children can play in an equipped playground.

The resort is just a 10-minute drive from Naama Bay and a 15-minute drive from central Sharm el-Sheikh.

Jaz Sharks Bay.address: 2 B Entrance Of Sharks Bay North Naama Bay, 99999 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Jaz Sharks Bay.description:
Jaz Sharks Bay is 4 stars all-inclusive hotel in one of the world’s most renowned destinations, Sharm El sheikh. Ideal for practical travelers looking for a comfortable getaway.

At this relaxed accommodation, each room boasts a breezy balcony or terrace, with charming views of the pool and garden. Our two swimming pools are ideally designed to accommodate guests who wish to either enjoy a laid-back tan or take a refreshing dip.

At Jaz Sharks Bay resort, our guests are entitled only for beach use at Jaz Belvedere resort, all other outlets & services are not permitted for use, A free shuttle bus with a schedule to the beach is available for our guests.

Along with the wide range of facilities and impeccable services, guests will savour an exquisite dining experience through a culinary journey like no other.

Jaz Sharks Bay is in the heart of the vibrant diving scene in Sharm El-Sheikh, while being only a minute away from Sharm El Sheikh International Airport. And if you’re looking for shopping and nightlife, the renowned Naama Bay is close by and transportation can be arranged by the hotel.

sharm El sheikh suny laks.description:
Situated in Sharm El Sheikh, 42 km from Ras Mohammed National Park and 7.9 km from Tonino Lamborghini International Convention Center Sharm El Sheikh, sharm El sheikh suny laks offers air conditioning. The property is around 8.1 km from Ghibli Raceway, 6.5 km from Sinai Grand Casino and 11 km from The Heavenly Cathedral. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and SOHO Square Sharm El Sheikh is 4.2 km away.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is offered. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Porto Sharm is 12 km from the apartment, while Ras um Sid is 19 km from the property. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport, 2 km from sharm El sheikh suny laks.

Luxury Apartment Panorama Naama Heights.description:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a private pool, pool view and a terrace, Luxury Apartment Panorama Naama Heights Resort is set in Sharm El Sheikh. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking. The property is 2.1 km from Naama Bay Beach, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and minibar. The accommodation is non-smoking.

A bar can be found on-site.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

SOHO Square Sharm El Sheikh is 11 km from the apartment, while Ras Mohammed National Park is 37 km from the property. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport, 9 km from Luxury Apartment Panorama Naama Heights Resort.

Oriental Rivoli Hotel & Spa.address: Peace Road, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Oriental Rivoli Hotel & Spa.description:
Situated between the Sinai Desert and the Red Sea, Oriental Rivoli Hotel offers 3 swimming pools and a private beach. It also has a Hammam and rooms with LCD TVs.

Decorated in luxurious oriental style, all rooms come with individually-controlled air conditioning and minibars. Each has a work desk and a safety deposit box. Some rooms feature private balconies.

Lavish amenities include massage facilities and a hot tub. Water activities including diving and snorkelling can be organised at the private beach.

Oriental Rivoli has 2 restaurants, 2 bars and a café with a shisha lounge. Guests can enjoy local and international cuisine on the open-air terrace with mountain views. Free Wi-Fi is available in all outdoor areas.

This 4-star hotel enjoys a quiet location close to Naama Bay’s bars and restaurants. It is situated 15 minutes’ drive from the Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport.

Stella Di Mare Beach Hotel & Spa.address: Naama Bay, 14211 Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Stella Di Mare Beach Hotel & Spa.description:
This luxurious 5-star resort is situated on a private beach at scenic Na'ama Bay’s entrance. The resort offers 3 gourmet restaurants, state-of-the-art dive training and a 600 m2 spa.

Stella Di Mare’s modern, spacious rooms have large windows and plenty of natural light. Each features a private outdoor terrace or balcony, some with sweeping views of the Red Sea. In-room amenities include satellite LCD TV and all-day room service.

Stella Di Mare’s lagoon-style outdoor swimming pool is surrounded by a waterfall and tropical gardens. Guests can snorkel in coral reefs located directly off of the resort’s beach. Evening entertainment is offered nightly.

La Terrazza serves candlelit dinners at its outdoor, sea-facing terrace. Fresh Mediterranean cuisine is available at Stella Di Mare’s Corallo Rosso restaurant. Italian cuisine is on offer at La Scogliera.

The islands of Ras Mohammed National Park are 16 km from the hotel. Stella Di Mare Beach Hotel & Spa is located a 20-minute drive away from Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport. A free shuttle service to Naama Bay is offered.

Al Crown.description:
Set in Sharm El Sheikh and only 400 metres from Ras Um El Sid Beach, Al Crown offers accommodation with mountain views, free WiFi and free private parking. The property was built in 2010 and has air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, full-day security and currency exchange for guests.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with sea views. This apartment also features a patio that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

The area is popular for cycling, and car hire and free use of bicycles are available at the apartment. The apartment complex has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Sharm El Maya Bay Beach is 1.8 km from Al Crown, while SOHO Square Sharm El Sheikh is 21 km from the property. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International, 18 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Oonas Dive Club’s rooms have a modern décor and each one is fitted with air conditioning and large windows and a balcony with a sea view. Each one has satellite TV, a fridge, tea and coffee making facilities and an electronic safe.

Oonas restaurant and bar is open throughout the day and serves sandwiches, salads and seafood dishes, all made from local produce

Oonas Hotel is 15 minutes' walk from Naama Bay centre. Sharm El Sheikh town centre is a 15-minute drive away.

The spacious apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and is protected by full-day security.

For those times when you'd rather not dine out, you can choose to cook on the barbecue.

Yoga classes and fitness classes are provided at the fitness room on site. For guests with children, the apartment provides outdoor play equipment. A bicycle rental service and a private beach area are featured at Amnesia Residence.

SOHO Square Sharm El Sheikh is 13 km from the accommodation, while Ras Mohammed National Park is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport, 10 km from Amnesia Residence.

Savoy Sharm El Sheikh.address: Soho Square, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Savoy Sharm El Sheikh.description:
Situated directly on the beach and in the center of SOHO Square, this 5-star resort offers lush tropical surroundings and luxurious rooms with satellite TVs. Facilities include 5 swimming pools and water sports activities that include diving and snorkeling. Tennis and squash courts are also available.

The bright rooms of Savoy Sharm El Sheikh Hotel enjoy a modern and stylish interior. All rooms have a private balcony or terrace featuring panoramic views of the landscaped gardens, the pools, or the Red Sea.

Savoy Sharm El Sheikh Hotel’s 6 restaurants serve dishes from all over the world, including Asian, Italian, and Mediterranean cuisine. Guests can enjoy a wide variety of drinks, live music, and water pipes at any of the 5 bars. SOHO Square Sharm El Sheikh provides entertainment for all tastes with a variety of restaurants, cafes and bars.

The Aqua Spa & Wellness Centre offers a range of health and beauty treatments, including Ayurvedic massages and body exfoliations. There is also a kids' club, games room with table football, and darts.

Sharm El Sheikh International Airport is 8 km away. Pick up service available by hotel bus for an additional charge and must be arranged minimum 48 hours in advance by providing flight details to a property.

All rooms at Naama Inn overlook the pool or Naama Bay. Each is equipped with a satellite TV, a minibar and a wardrobe. Some have a seating area with sofa, while the bathroom includes bath and shower.

Guests can enjoy the open buffet that is located at the swimming pool and serves local and international cuisine. Byblos serves Lebanese mezza and Morgan offers delightful sea food specialties. Room service is 24 hours.

Naama Inn has a retail shopping arcade that constitutes of 25 shops. With its traditional markets, the shops sell spices, handicrafts and Bedouin products. The hotel has a sun terrace where guests can soak up the sun.

Naama Bay’s shops and promenade, is a few minutes’ walk from Naama Inn Hotel. Sharm Al Shaik International Airport is 20 minutes by car. Free private parking is possible on site.

All the rooms and apartments overlook the garden, sea or pool. Each accommodation is equipped with a satellite TV, a wardrobe and a telephone. The apartment includes a living room with sofa. Some rooms include a balcony or patio.

The hotel’s main restaurant serves three meals daily which is breakfast, lunch and dinner. A buffet-style breakfast is served daily, while à-la-carte specialties are served in the evening. Room service is 24 hours.

Guests willing to take diving lessons can opt for the professional services offered by the diving centre at the hotel. Water sports available on site include snorkeling and wind surfing. Relaxing massage treatments can be arranged upon request.

Old Market in Sharm El Sheikh is located within 500 metres’ walk from Turquoise Beach Hotel. Sharm El Sheikh Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

Featuring balconies with views of the landscaped gardens and lagoons, the air-conditioned rooms at Blu come with a satellite TV, a safety box and a minibar. Toiletries are in the private bathrooms. All Rooms are featured with terrace.

Italian, Mediterranean, and Asian cuisine is served at Blu Sharm’s buffet-style restaurants. In the evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the sports bar. The hotel offers 5 restaurants including A La Carte menu.

Aqua Sharm has a well-equipped gym. Guests can cross the lagoon on a pedal boat or play a game of tennis or minigolf.

A shuttle to the private beach of Albatros Resort is offered. It features sun-loungers with umbrellas and water sports.

The staff at Pickalbatros Aqua Blu Sharm El Sheikh can arrange a shuttle to Sharm El-Sheik International Airport with extra fees.

Baron Resort Sharm El Sheikh.description:
This stylish, elegant and prestigious 5-star Sharm El Sheikh resort is situated on 600m of gorgeous private silky white sandy beach. It offers a lagoon-style pool and a 145m snorkeling and scuba diving platform. It has 9 restaurants and bars. It also offers a large sandy beach, Olympic-size sweet water swimming pool (heated in winter); only for adults partially–covered seawater whirlpool with jets and a kid's pool. The property offers a free shuttle bus once a day in the evening to Soho Square.

A pillow menu, satellite TV, and 100% Egyptian cotton bedding are offered in Baron Resort’s rooms. Each has floor-to-ceiling windows and a furnished balcony. Some have views of the Red Sea, Tiran Island or the resort gardens.

Baron Resort’s 9 dining and drinking options include beachfront Taj Mahal, which serves Indian specialities.  Now & Zen Dance bar offers exotic cocktails and evening music.  Restaurant theme nights vary and include traditional Bedouin dinners. Live entertainment is available at Al Sakia Seafood Restaurant and Oasis Pool Restaurant & Bar.

Algae wraps and Egyptian massages are offered at Baron Resort’s Health Club & Relaxation. Gym and steam rooms are also available.  Other activities available at the resort are beach volleyball, jogging and cycling track. It also offers a supervised kids club with a sleeping area.

The 24-hour staff can organise excursions to Ras Mohammed National Park which is 1.5 hours away by boat.  Baron Resort Sharm El Sheikh is 3 km from Soho Square, and Naama Bay  is 15 km away. Sharm El Sheikh International Airport is 8 km away.

Movenpick Resort Sharm El Sheikh.description:
Welcoming guests since 1998 , The Arabesque style resort is directly overlooking the turquoise water of Naama Bay with a wide panoramic view over the whole bay.

With authentic and simply decorated rooms , heated swimming pool , exceptional culinary experience , 5 beaches and a variety of water sports and activities , Mövenpick Resort Sharm El Sheik Naama Bay is your perfect choice for a relaxing hassle free vacation.

Oriental and Egyptian cuisine is offered at the El Kababgy Restaurant while La Brise serves Italian food. Indian food is served at the Rangoli. Liwa Restaurant serves international dishes from the terrace with Red Sea views.

Sharm Mövenpick guests can enjoy a relaxing massage, or visit the fitness center which includes cardiovascular equipment. There is also a tennis court and a hot tub. Nearby leisure activities include diving, snorkeling and horse riding. Horse lovers find a riding paradise within the resort with breathtaking views over a desert and sea landscape with offers of various trips to the beach and to the desert for beginners and experienced riders.

Mövenpick Sharm El-Sheikh is conveniently located a 10-minute drive from both Sharm El-Sheikh International Airport and the city centre. Free private parking is available on site, airport shuttle is on request with extra fee.

Club El Faraana Reef Resort.address: Hadabah Om El Sid, Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt
Club El Faraana Reef Resort.description:
Located directly at the Cliff of Ras Um Sid, Faraana Reef Resort overlooks the Red Sea. It boasts a private beach, 3 swimming pools and a discotheque. Diving and other water sports can be arranged upon request.

All rooms and suites at Faraana feature a balcony or terrace with garden, pool or sea view. Each one offers a satellite TV, a minibar and a wardrobe. The suite includes a spacious living room.

Guests can feast on a selection of grills served at the Panorama and Grill Restaurant while enjoying the spectacular sea view. Cocktails, mocktails and light snacks are served at the 3 pool bars.

After an energizing workout at the gym, guests can enjoy a game of tennis at the tennis court. For more relaxed options, a sauna and a hot tub are available at the spa for an added charge.

A variety of shops is available at the retail shopping arcade located on site. Naama Bay with its promenade and markets is a 5-minute drive away. A shuttle service is available to Naama Bay.
